song.title: Ivory Dreamz - Part 2
song.info:
Mozaic of Expulsion Music proudly present
.oO Ivory Dreamz Oo. - Part 2 - Finished: 27.03.1999
Released at the mekka symp 2K-1
Don't play with urself vote for me 8)
Greetings to:
All in Expulsion All in SDI and SR? All in Code Red Andreas, Veronika, Kater, AcidChris, Jan, Caki, N.Styles, Alex & Franzi, Little Witch, Stefan, Heike, Ellen
and all on IRC #coders.ger
Contact me at:
M. Krupp Worth 10 27386 Hemsbuende or mozaic@www.funcity.de
I don't know if thiz 1 might ever used in our first release or when thiz first release will be finished so don't ask me stupid questions about it!
Oh...there is no Intro part for thiz song. Of course not! It's a SECOND part!!! Got it ?
Swapping the sampbank will bring up some messages!
So...c ya fellaz! I'm out of here!
(C) Mozaic'99 - Entropy - We really should start coding something for thiz one 8)
- AcidChris - Try to beat thiz!
- Alex - Phunk dat!
- Franzi - Sorry for thiz messy evening...meshed it up again...shame on me! Mea culpa 8) - Kater - Ask for more "Kekse"!
- Adiktor - After thiz evening... it's really easy! Thx!
- Vero - Best coffee in the whole galaxy 8)
- Bill gates - It's a bugs life with ur stupid OS! Pie in ur face! - M. Lewinski - Blas mal!
*** End ***
Nope...not really 8)
Just the beginning !
EXPULSION
